website_summaries.verdict: The Kodak ScanMate i1150 is an impressively capable scanner, with extras ranging from boosted scan speed for the first 10 pages, to showing profile names on its LCD for one-button scanning.
pros: LCD shows profile names for one-button scanning
cons: Limited to only nine predefined scan definitions

customer_reviews.title: Super fast scanner but not suited to photos
customer_reviews.text: Super fast scanner. Very easy to set up and configure with 9 preset settings. I use all 9 of them so an example would be "Colour PDF Single Sided" or "B&W PDF Double Sided". Its amazing at taking one sheet at a time through the feeder. Not once have I seen it double feed with 2 sheets stuck together. Beware though that it would not be the best for scanning family photos. Attached are 2 images. One from a typical cheap Epson Workforce Printer/Flatbed scanner and another from the Kodak. Both at 600dpi with max jpeg quality and little compression. The Epson is much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ezd2

customer_reviews.title: Unpredictable
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get this to work consistently which you dont expect from such an ecpensive item. When worked seemed very good.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well does exactly what it is meant to do. very fast
customer_reviews.author: george x

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: A really great product. Does exactly what we expected and more. Totally reliable and support for all major OS's
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Oakes

customer_reviews.title: DON't BUY IF YOU HAVE WINDOWS 10
customer_reviews.text: Scanner was great that was until I upgraded my computer to WINDOWS 10. Now it won't work apart from on my laptop that still has windows 8. KODAK support.....NON-EXISTANT. Rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Buy Fujitsu iX500 if you are comparing with i1150
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine, looking forward to replace my Fujitsu iX500. I decided to keep my iX500 and return this kodak machine at the end. Pro: Good image quality and tone. Good speed, as advertised, at low dpi. Cons: Unbearably slow at color 300dpi and black 600dpi. By comparison, Fujitsu iX500 can maintain 25 sheets per minute at these resolutions. Generation of searchable PDF is very slow compared with iX500. Poor Mac OS support. Its Windows software does NOT work with Parallels Desktop + Win10. (But VirtualBox + Win10 is ok.)
customer_reviews.author: Hongchi Chou

customer_reviews.title: Watch out - Does not work with MacOS.
customer_reviews.text: Watch out, they scanner is NOT MacOS compatible even though the manufacturers information states that it is. It will work on a Mac but ONLY with the limited functionality PAPERMANAGER software bundled with the so called MacOS drivers. Hardware construction is excellent and setup is simple but if you want to use any other scanner software or the building Mac tools, forget it. Go find another scanner and check the feedback to confirm. I ended up sending this one back and purchasing the Fujitsu iX500 ScanSnap which IS MacOS compatible
customer_reviews.author: mjsoutherland

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and quick to setup!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to scan my large collection of home photos. Easy to set up and use. Recommended for anyone trying to take their make their home photos digital.
customer_reviews.author: Shrumit

customer_reviews.title: There are much better options unless you only need it for check scanning.
customer_reviews.text: Only have this scanner because my company requires it for check scanning. It is constantly pulling in more than one page at a time which means it takes twice as long to get the job done correctly. I have a scan snap from Fujitsu and love it. It’s easy to use and seldom fails.
customer_reviews.author: Frank McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Best Scanner for the money
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is great. Sans both sides of the document. It is very fast. It takes up very little room on your "real desk top". Very easy to install and operate. Perfect for a customer service business environment. My entire office of 12 people is paperless thanks to this device. Everybody has one on their desk.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: This product lasted less than one year and is not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: tparros

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Scanner!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing!!! Worth every penny. My wife uses it for pictures and great quality. Really fast and simple
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Better then the Epson 510
customer_reviews.text: considerately better then the Epson 510. Stays connected to Papervision, does not jam, handles many sizes of paper within the same file. I used the Epson 510 for 1.5 years. Now I don't have to tolerated the above mentions problems. However, my experience with the Kodak is based on two weeks of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great scanner for a great price. I am fond of Kodak imaging products and have had great success with their scanners for more than 15 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with this scanner
customer_reviews.text: very pleased with this scanner. We are converting 3000 files to the cloud and this machine works perfectly. Scans both sides at once.
customer_reviews.author: John Mace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scanner and very easy to use. Would highly recommend. Works as well as my $750 kodak i40 which is not discontinued
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Very good value
customer_reviews.text: I also have an i1120 and like them both very much. Great values for my small business.
customer_reviews.author: Larry G

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at work but alas when I ordered it for home it was not compatible with my Mac
customer_reviews.author: Deborah F. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Scanner but the software doesn't do justice to the product.
customer_reviews.author: ypp32

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever
customer_reviews.text: The scanner works like robot, very fast and efficient. It delivered us from manual way of office management o the best digital platform.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Installation notes
customer_reviews.text: Installed almost flawlessly on 11 computers. Works well with EMC AppXtender.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is supposed to do and very efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: D in KC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scanner
customer_reviews.text: Multiple scanning options such as PDF color, PDF B&W, TIFF, JPEG, scan to email. Quality is superb and functionality is easy, this is the 30th one my company has purchased for offices across the US. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_SharkTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this after previously owning a Fujitsu Scansnap that ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after previously owning a Fujitsu Scansnap that had died on me, The device itself is incredibly well made and smaller in real life than I had expected. Its very fast and I certainly have no regrets switching brands, once you go Kodak, you will never go back !
customer_reviews.author: Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner with good quality scanning.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scanner and I have it sat on my desk for everyday use. It is compact enough to sit on my desk without getting in the way. Previously I was just using a Multifunction printer for scanning and the quality on the I1150 stands head and shoulders above the multifunction printer. I would strongly recommend this scanner to anyone that has day to day scanning needs.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small office use
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small office scanner for application forms, after doing my homework I chose the i1150 and wasn't disappointed. The free software was simple to use to scan PDF's and send them to folder locations. The forms we use have barcodes on relating to customer data, not only does the scanner read barcodes, it names PDFs by the information for easy retrieval. I won't be going back to mfd's and highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: WillyWonker

customer_reviews.title: Seems a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I tried one in our office and was very impressed by its functionality given it is at the "lower" end of the market and appears well manufactured. It does seem quiet and fairly fast and meets Energy Star criteria so running costs have been considered. Didn`t jam either. Seems a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: DR G N BATTS

customer_reviews.title: worts scanner i havew ver hsd - do not waste your money on this trash
customer_reviews.text: absolute rubbish ended up throwing it in the trash and buying something else avoid like the plague
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOU HAVE A MAC!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOU HAVE A MAC!!! In order to run this software with a Mac you have to disable your Security Integrity System FOREVER. How does this exist in 2017? Its worthless without the software, save yourself the time and hassle it's going to take to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Gubler

product_meta.title: Kodak Scanmate i1150 1664390 Document Scanner, Black/gray
product_meta.description: Kodak scanmate I1150 Scanner processes transactions at the speed of business. The transformation of information capture continues. Businesses must deal with more diverse sources of information than ever before. And yet paper remains an important input source. Companies are focused on generating efficiencies where the value of information capture from paper is Greatest - in business transactions. The Kodak scanmate I1150 Scanner is designed for use in customer-facing business transactions, where an employee needs to scan documents as part of a business process. Employees using these solutions are typically interacting with customers and need to keep the transaction moving to reduce wait times and increase customer satisfaction. Recognizing that a majority of transactions involve 10 or fewer documents to be scanned, the Kodak scanmate I1150 Scanner features a special transaction mode, enabling 60 percent faster capture speed for the first 10 pages. Scan documents and capture information, extract data, and handle documents once. Benefit from an intuitive, icon-based color interface. Take advantage of associated cost savings. And that's just the beginning. Small, quiet, quick, and intelligently designed, the scanmate I1150 Scanner accelerates your processes with seamless technology so you can focus on your customers.
feature_bullets: Ability to scan a mix of paper documents, IDs, and hard cards means you can capture information quickly and efficiently. Transaction Mode : 40 ppm at 200 dpi and 300 dpi - first 10 pages
Ideal choice for desktop scanning in a full range of businesses, including medical office registration desks, bank teller use, state and municipal government offices, and insurance agencies

Smart Touch technology lets you perform up to nine different tasks with the push of a button — including creating PDFs, attaching documents to e-mails, organizing them in folders, or sending them to Cloud services. Supported Operating System- WINDOWS 10 (32-bit and 64-bit), WINDOWS 8.1 (32-bit and 64-bit), WINDOWS 8 (32-bit and 64-bit), WINDOWS 7 SP1 (32-bit and 64-bit), WINDOWS VISTA SP1 (32-bit and 64-bit), WINDOWS SERVER 2008 (64-bit) and SERVER 2012 (64-bit), LINUX UBUNTU 14.04 (LTS), MAC OS 10.8, 10.9 or 10.10
Instantly view the number of documents scanned or paper ready status via the graphical display panel, providing users with useful information to help avoid or resolve errors
Protect valuable documents with Intelligent Document Protection that “hears” potential jams or misfeeds and stops scanning before damage can occur

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars79 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
